content:
allow-async-bind 1
restore-initial-pose 0

Configuration

All of the above asynchronous operations will take place on a separate task chain <task-chains>, automatically created by .Loader. By default, one low-priority thread is created to serve these requests. To increase the number of available threads, or to increase their priority, these configuration variables can be changed:

# default is 1
loader-num-threads 2
# default is low
loader-thread-priority normal
